name: The Time Traveler's Mansion
description:
You need a controller to play-- Sorry, I ran out of time on Monday (had to work late) and wasn't able to put keyboard controls in.

READ THIS BEFORE PLAYING IF YOU WANT TO HAVE ANY IDEA OF WHATS GOING ON.

1. You get a certain amount of steps

2. You can't step where you have already stepped.

3. The starting spot will refill your ... stamina, I guess?  

4. The starting spot will spawn a clone you can collide with who does exactly what you did last cycle.

5. The goal is to each cycle do or start something then, go back to the starting spot

6. If you get stuck or want to restart hit the right shoulder button.

The game was meant to be more of a rhythm game with different controller inputs (Hence the "Hard Mode" version), but I hadn't really balanced for that yet.  I will post a link to a newer balanced version which is the best of the easy and the hard version.

It's like 1/4 as good as it could be with a little more time, but considering I did it in roughly 24 hours and didn't entirely neglect my kids during that time I'd say its ... not bad.  Thanks for playing.  

-HeartLamp
